channel.title: Errors Errors Errors
channel.description:
Using Kronik Server and source. Got don with all the edits on setup. Now I got issues with the .bat files. says Ant is not a rec command blah blah blah u know the song and dance. Heres the code. Please help ty.
Complier: [code]ant pause[/code]
run_lserver.bat: [code]@echo off ant runls pause[/code]
run_map.bat [code]@echo off ant map pause[/code]
run_server.bat [code]@echo off ant runserver pause[/code]
After looking at a few other run bats I assume it needs a java code to relate it back to java? If so I use java 6 update 11 not sure though how these should look ideas?

item.title: Errors Errors Errors
item.dc:creator: @old_school old_school
item.description:
@old_school wrote:

Using Kronik Server and source. Got don with all the edits on setup. Now I got issues with the .bat files. says Ant is not a rec command blah blah blah u know the song and dance. Heres the code. Please help ty.

Complier:

ant pause

run_lserver.bat:

@echo off ant runls pause

run_map.bat

@echo off ant map pause

run_server.bat

@echo off ant runserver pause

After looking at a few other run bats I assume it needs a java code to relate it back to java? If so I use java 6 update 11 not sure though how these should look ideas?
